Clone.summary: Creates a clone of this object.
Clone.remarks: The items parameter is used as a template for a new object.

_AddItem.summary: Adds the item to the array.
_AddItem.param: The item to add to the list.
_AddItem.remarks: This method must only be called from the child class.

Remove.summary: Removes the the object which matches the data values.
Remove.param: The unique data names and values.
Remove.remarks: Uses the dataColumns to identify the item.

Retrieve.summary: Retrieves the object which matches the data values.
Retrieve.param: The unique data names and values.
Retrieve.remarks: Uses the dataColumns to identify the item.

RetrieveAtIndex.summary: Retrieves the object with the supplied index.
RetrieveAtIndex.returns: The collection item at the supplied index.

GetIndex.summary: Gets the index of the object which matches the data values.
GetIndex.param: The unique data names and values.
GetIndex.returns: The index of the matching collection item.
GetIndex.remarks: Uses the dataColumns to identify the item.

IsMatch.summary: Checks if the item matches the data values.
IsMatch.param: The unique data names and values.
IsMatch.returns: true if it matches; otherwise false.
